00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief fov_center gets center of fov from sensitivity maps 
00003 %>
00004 %> @param sensor     sensor object
00005 %> @param S_Pha_map  sensitivity map calculated for phantom or model
00006 %> @param S_0_map    sensitivity map calculated for initial solution Ep(0)
00007 %> @param S_map      - sensitivity map calculated for current solution estimate S(i)
00008 %>
00009 %> @retval S_Pha   sensitivity matrix calculated for phantom or model
00010 %> @retval S_0     sensitivity matrix calculated for initial solution Ep(0)
00011 %> @retval S       sensitivity matrix calculated for current solution estimate S(i)
00012 % =====================================================================
00013 function [S_Pha, S_0, S] = fov_center (rec_obj, sensor, S_Pha_map, S_0_map, S_map)
00014                                                         
00015 % matrices should be reshaped to vectors! or call sum(sum(A));
00016 
00017 [p] = find(sensor.MC~=sensor.cfov.flag);
00018 
00019 for i=1:rec_obj.Ef_pha.sens_matrix_num
00020     T = S_Pha_map(:,:,i);
00021     T(p)=0;
00022     S_Pha_map(:,:,i) = T;
00023     T = S_0_map(:,:,i);
00024     T(p)=0;
00025     S_0_map(:,:,i) = T;
00026     T = S_map(:,:,i);
00027     T(p)=0;
00028     S_map(:,:,i) = T;
00029 end
00030 
00031 
00032 S_Pha = reshape_sens(S_Pha_map, sensor.discret_matrix_size, rec_obj.Ef_pha.sens_matrix_num);
00033 S_0   = reshape_sens(S_0_map, sensor.discret_matrix_size, rec_obj.Ef_pha.sens_matrix_num);
00034 S     = reshape_sens(S_map, sensor.discret_matrix_size, rec_obj.Ef_pha.sens_matrix_num);
